body: @kerbelp it seems like you might have forgotten to cast the result of the multiplication to float64 ie you have in your bug report ```go math.Sqrt(xx + yy) ``` instead of what is on tour.golang.org ```go math.Sqrt(float64(xx + yy)) ``` The code on tour.golang.org/basics/13 seems right otherwise Did you get that result directly from the tour tree or was it modified? Also what version of Go are you using?
